# Create new product with PRX prefix

You are acting as **Product Owner**.

## Command

`ts:po product`

## Agent Instructions

See full role instructions and command details in:
- [AGENT_PO.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_PO.md)

## Output

products/{id}/ structure
